level.heading: CONSIDERATION OF CASES BY THE BOARD, EXCEPT FOR D.C. POLICE OFFICERS ANDIREFIGHTERS HIRED AFTER FEBRUARY 15, 1980 (ยง 7-2514)

level.text: This section shall apply to consideration of cases by the Board, .except for D.C. Police Officers.
In considering the cases presented to the Board, the Board shall do the following:
Make a determination regarding eligibility for disability retirement in cases involving injury or disease;
When disability is found to exist, determine whether or not the disability is duty-related;
Determine eligibility in optional retirement cases;
Decide all matters pertaining to survivor’s relief and lump sum performance-of-duty benefits;
Determine, on the basis of periodic medical evaluation, the continuing eligibility of an annuitant;
Determine, on the basis of annual income, the continuing eligibility of an annuitant;
Determine total disability, and the percentage thereof;
Determine the effective date of disability retirement; and
Make any other findings as deemed necessary to carry out its function.
